column4: I can't remove the CD
it says that device is busy
please help me, the CD won't come out in the middle of the install
what are you trying to do?
I am trying to instal Unreal Tournament 2004 (after I understood I had to do bash: linux-installer.sh -.-
it asks for CD2
and it won't let it out
your shell probably has the working directory on the CD.
so what do I do?
try to run the installer form another directory: "cd /tmp; bash /media/cdrom/installer.sh" or whatever
hmm so just run it from another directory?
yup, try it (if you currently are running it from a shell whose working dir is on the CD)
hey it's asking me if I want to install symbolic links:
what does it mean?
does anyone know how I can assign a fixed name to a PCMCIA WLAN card? it sometimes comes up as eth1, sometimes eth2 or eth3, and I always need to reconfigure the WEP parameters...
in what context? it might want to install a link on your desktop - or it might want to install only part of the game on your HD, keeping the rest on CD
Do you want to install sybmbolic links to a directory in your path
then it asks if I where do I want to put it
I know that problem, you need to untick the online video feature
yay it works!
thanks
congrats
